description: In contrast to the nostalgic period designs of most of Narcissa Niblack Thorne’s miniature rooms, this Jazz Age Parisian library is decorated in a contemporary Art Deco style. As a woman of financial means, Thorne likely spent time in glamorous, modern interiors like this one on her numerous trips to France’s fashionable capital throughout the 1920s and 1930s.
artist_info:
Designed by Narcissa Niblack Thorne
American
1882-1966
title: E-27: French Library of the Modern Period, 1930s
